statements: SELECT * FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;

SELECT AVG(distance), MAX(distance), MIN(distance) FROM routes;

SELECT * FROM routes WHERE start_location = 'City A' AND end_location = 'City B';

SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE distance BETWEEN 50 AND 100

SELECT MIN(distance) AS min_distance, MAX(distance) AS max_distance FROM routes
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_routes FROM routes
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE distance > 50 ORDER BY estimated_time

SELECT * FROM routes WHERE start_location LIKE '%City%'

SELECT start_location, end_location, distance*2 AS double_distance FROM routes
SELECT route_id, CONCAT(start_location, ' to ', end_location) AS route_description FROM routes

SELECT * FROM routes WHERE distance > 75 AND (start_location = 'City A' OR end_location = 'City B')

SELECT * FROM routes LIMIT 10
SELECT DISTINCT start_location FROM routes
SELECT start_location, COUNT(*) AS num_routes FROM routes GROUP BY start_location

SELECT * FROM routes WHERE start_location <> end_location
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_id, origin, destination FROM routes WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT * FROM schedules;
SELECT schedule_id, route_id, departure_time FROM schedules WHERE arrival_time > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT origin, destination FROM routes WHERE distance BETWEEN 200 AND 500;
SELECT route_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules WHERE departure_time > '2022-09-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM routes;
SELECT MAX(distance), MIN(distance), AVG(distance) FROM routes;
SELECT route_id, origin, destination, distance FROM routes ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT origin, destination FROM routes;
SELECT route_id, COUNT(*) AS num_schedules FROM schedules GROUP BY route_id HAVING num_schedules > 3;
SELECT route_id, origin, destination, distance FROM routes WHERE origin = 'New York';
SELECT route_id, origin, destination, distance FROM routes WHERE destination LIKE '%Florida%';
SELECT route_id, origin, destination, distance FROM routes WHERE origin != destination;
SELECT route_id, origin, destination, distance FROM routes LIMIT 10;
SELECT route_id, origin, destination, distance FROM routes OFFSET 5;
SELECT route_id, origin, destination, distance FROM routes WHERE distance = (SELECT MAX(distance) FROM routes);
SELECT route_id, origin, destination, distance FROM routes INNER JOIN schedules ON routes.route_id = schedules.route_id;
SELECT route_id, origin, destination, distance FROM routes LEFT JOIN schedules ON routes.route_id = schedules.route_id;
SELECT route_id, origin, destination, distance FROM routes RIGHT JOIN schedules ON routes.route_id = schedules.route_id;
SELECT route_id, origin, destination, distance FROM routes FULL JOIN schedules ON routes.route_id = schedules.route_id;

SELECT origin, destination FROM routes WHERE origin = 'New York' AND destination = 'Los Angeles'
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules WHERE route_id = 1
SELECT * FROM routes JOIN schedules ON routes.route_id = schedules.route_id
SELECT routes.route_id, schedules.departure_time FROM routes LEFT JOIN schedules ON routes.route_id = schedules.route_id
SELECT AVG(distance) AS average_distance FROM routes
SELECT DISTINCT origin FROM routes
SELECT COUNT(*) AS route_count FROM routes
SELECT * FROM routes ORDER BY distance DESC
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE origin LIKE 'M%'
SELECT schedule_id, origin, destination, departure_time, arrival_time FROM routes JOIN schedules ON routes.route_id = schedules.route_id

SELECT AVG(distance) AS average_distance FROM routes GROUP BY origin
SELECT route_id, COUNT(*) AS schedule_count FROM schedules GROUP BY route_id
SELECT MAX(distance) AS max_distance FROM routes
SELECT AVG(distance) AS average_distance, MAX(distance) AS max_distance FROM routes
SELECT route_id, COUNT(*) AS schedule_count FROM schedules GROUP BY route_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2

SELECT * FROM routes WHERE SUBSTR(origin, 1, 1) = SUBSTR(destination, 1, 1)
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_id, origin, destination FROM routes;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type FROM vehicles;

SELECT schedule_id, route_id, vehicle_id FROM schedules;

SELECT vehicle_type, max_capacity, current_load FROM vehicles WHERE current_load < max_capacity;

SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Bus';

SELECT origin, destination FROM routes WHERE distance < 50
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE max_capacity > 500
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type FROM vehicles WHERE current_load < max_capacity * 0.7
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE departure_time > NOW()
SELECT route_id, vehicle_id, arrival_time FROM schedules WHERE arrival_time < NOW()
SELECT r.origin, v.current_load FROM routes r JOIN vehicles v ON r.route_id = v.vehicle_id
SELECT route_id, origin, destination, v.max_capacity FROM routes JOIN vehicles v ON routes.route_id = v.vehicle_id
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE origin LIKE 'New%'
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type IN ('Car', 'Truck')
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE route_id IN (SELECT route_id FROM routes WHERE distance > 200)
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE vehicle_id IN (SELECT vehicle_id FROM vehicles WHERE max_capacity > 1000)
SELECT r.origin, v.vehicle_type, s.departure_time FROM routes r JOIN vehicles v ON r.route_id = v.vehicle_id JOIN schedules s ON r.route_id = s.route_id
SELECT route_id, origin, destination, v.max_capacity, s.arrival_time FROM routes JOIN vehicles v ON routes.route_id = v.vehicle_id JOIN schedules s ON routes.route_id = s.route_id

SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE current_load > 0.8 * max_capacity
SELECT r.origin, v.vehicle_type, s.departure_time FROM routes r, vehicles v, schedules s WHERE r.route_id = v.vehicle_id AND r.route_id = s.route_id
SELECT route_id, origin, destination, v.max_capacity FROM routes, vehicles v WHERE routes.route_id = v.vehicle_id
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE arrival_time < '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM routes;

SELECT * FROM schedules;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT route_id, origin, destination FROM routes;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type FROM vehicles;
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules;
SELECT driver_id, driver_name, license_type FROM drivers;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE schedule_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT route_id, origin, destination FROM routes WHERE distance_km > 100;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type FROM vehicles WHERE capacity_kg >= 1000;
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT driver_id, driver_name, license_type FROM drivers WHERE license_type = 'CDL';
SELECT r.origin, r.destination, s.departure_time, s.arrival_time FROM routes r JOIN schedules s ON r.route_id = s.route_id;
SELECT v.vehicle_type, s.departure_time, s.arrival_time, d.driver_name FROM vehicles v JOIN schedules s ON v.vehicle_id = s.vehicle_id JOIN drivers d ON s.schedule_id = d.schedule_id;

SELECT r.origin, r.destination, v.vehicle_type, d.driver_name FROM routes r JOIN schedules s ON r.route_id = s.route_id JOIN vehicles v ON s.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id JOIN drivers d ON s.schedule_id = d.schedule_id;

SELECT rt.route_id, rt.origin, rt.destination, rt.distance_km, vh.vehicle_type, vh.capacity_kg, vh.max_speed_kmh, sch.departure_time, sch.arrival_time, drv.driver_name, drv.license_type FROM routes rt JOIN schedules sch ON rt.route_id = sch.route_id JOIN vehicles vh ON sch.vehicle_id = vh.vehicle_id JOIN drivers drv ON sch.schedule_id = drv.schedule_id WHERE rt.distance_km > 100 AND vh.max_speed_kmh > 80

SELECT rt.route_id, rt.origin, rt.destination, rt.distance_km, vh.vehicle_type, vh.capacity_kg, vh.max_speed_kmh, sch.departure_time, sch.arrival_time, drv.driver_name, drv.license_type FROM routes rt JOIN schedules sch ON rt.route_id = sch.route_id JOIN vehicles vh ON sch.vehicle_id = vh.vehicle_id JOIN drivers drv ON sch.schedule_id = drv.schedule_id WHERE rt.origin = 'City A' AND vh.capacity_kg > 500
SELECT rt.route_id, rt.origin, rt.destination, rt.distance_km, vh.vehicle_type, vh.capacity_kg, vh.max_speed_kmh,...

SELECT origin, destination FROM routes;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type FROM vehicles;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_id, driver_name FROM drivers;

SELECT schedule_id, route_id, vehicle_id, driver_id FROM schedules;
SELECT * FROM shipments;
SELECT shipment_id, route_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM shipments;
SELECT route_id, COUNT(*) AS shipment_count FROM shipments GROUP BY route_id;
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(*) AS schedule_count FROM schedules GROUP BY vehicle_id;
SELECT origin, destination, distance FROM routes WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT driver_name FROM drivers WHERE driver_name LIKE 'A%';

SELECT route_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM shipments WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01';

SELECT * FROM routes ORDER BY distance DESC;

SELECT * FROM routes JOIN schedules ON routes.route_id = schedules.route_id WHERE origin = 'New York'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM vehicles WHERE capacity > 100
SELECT vehicles.vehicle_type, AVG(capacity) as avg_capacity FROM schedules JOIN vehicles ON schedules.vehicle_id = vehicles.vehicle_id GROUP BY vehicles.vehicle_type

SELECT drivers.driver_name, COUNT(*) as num_shipments FROM drivers JOIN schedules ON drivers.driver_id = schedules.driver_id JOIN shipments ON schedules.route_id = shipments.route_id GROUP BY drivers.driver_name
SELECT DISTINCT origin, destination FROM routes
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE distance BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY distance DESC
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type IN ('Truck', 'Van')
SELECT SUM(capacity) as total_capacity FROM vehicles
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE origin = 'Los Angeles' OR destination = 'San Francisco'
SELECT driver_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM drivers JOIN schedules ON drivers.driver_id = schedules.driver_id WHERE departure_time >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_type ASC, capacity DESC
SELECT driver_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM drivers JOIN schedules ON drivers.driver_id = schedules.driver_id WHERE arrival_time < '2023-01-01'
SELECT origin, destination, COUNT(*) as num_shipments FROM routes JOIN shipments ON routes.route_id = shipments.route_id GROUP BY origin, destination
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE driver_name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT vehicle_type, SUM(capacity) as total_capacity FROM vehicles GROUP BY vehicle_type HAVING total_capacity > 500
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE arrival_time IS NOT NULL
SELECT driver_name, AVG(DATEDIFF(hour, departure_time, arrival_time)) as avg_duration FROM drivers JOIN schedules ON drivers.driver_id = schedules.driver_id GROUP BY driver_name
SELECT origin, destination, ROUND(AVG(distance),2) as avg_distance FROM routes GROUP BY origin, destination
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE departure_time >= '2022-06-01' AND arrival_time <= '2022-06-30'
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT driver_id) as num_drivers FROM schedules
